title: stevennhansen

content: I will establish an email campaign for your NFT or Crypto project.Â  Mailing to a base of 6 million OpenSea users (1.2% click-through-rate), or 40K DAO base (18-20% conversions)6M OpenSea base mailing - $850040K DAO base mailing - $60001) What is the TATThe turnaround time for bot tasks is 6 days2) Payment methods.USDT, BUSD, SOL, BTC, ETH, MATIC, BNB or any other "well-known" crypto.3) Any refunds?No, I don't provide any refunds. I am fully confident in what I provide.4) Any Review Copies?I don't provide review copies, but every person who will order my service will get a bonus - I will re-tweet one tweet for free after the main order complete.Contact me: deuris1212@gmail.com or Telegram: t.me/al1ex2 (@al1ex2)
